actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $300 of interest received by an individual during any taxable year.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income up to $300 of interest income paid to the taxpayer from savings accounts.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income $300 of interest received by an individual during any taxable year.
